hero.subtitle: Professional social media management and video editing that transforms talented athletes into recognized sports stars

about.title: WHO WE ARE
about.description: Established in 2025, we're a cutting-edge sports marketing agency with an impeccable team of professionals dedicated to one mission:
about.highlight: making talented athletes visible to the world
about.missionDesc: We connect talented athletes with professional teams and sports brands by creating compelling social media presence that showcases their true potential.
about.teamDesc: Our professional video editors and social media managers have years of experience in sports marketing and athlete branding.
about.sportsDesc: From soccer to swimming, basketball to boxing - we specialize in promoting athletes across every sport, with a special focus on soccer.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.subtitle: Complete social media management package designed to maximize your athletic visibility
services.socialDesc: Professional management of your Instagram and TikTok accounts with strategic content planning and posting schedules
services.videoDesc: Expert editing team transforms your raw footage into compelling highlight reels that capture your athletic excellence
services.brandDesc: Strategic connections with professional teams and sports brands looking for talented athletes like you
services.step1: Create your TikTok and Instagram accounts with your athletic content
services.step2: Our team manages, edits, and optimizes your content professionally
services.step3: Watch your visibility grow as teams and brands discover your talent

contract.title: Sports Representation Contract
contract.subtitle: Please review and accept the terms of our representation agreement.
contract.acceptRequired: You must accept the contract to proceed.
contract.acceptLabel: I have read and agree to the Sports Representation Contract
contract.clause1Desc: This Contract is entered into between Global Media Sports ("Agency") and the User ("Athlete").
contract.clause2Title: 2. Clause for Participation in Signing Bonuses and Transfer
contract.clause2Desc:
Consideration for Intermediation and Career Projection

Right to Commission:
By virtue of the marketing, brand projection, and career management services provided by the AGENCY, the ATHLETE acknowledges and agrees that the AGENCY shall be entitled to receive a percentage of any Signing Bonus (Sign-on Fee), recruitment bonus, or analogous amount that the ATHLETE receives as a result of signing a new employment contract or transfer with a club, team, or sports entity.

Applicable Percentage:
The financial consideration in favor of the AGENCY is set at 10% (plus the corresponding VAT) of the total gross amount of the aforementioned Signing Bonus.

Accrual and Payment: Said commission shall accrue at the time of signing the new contract. Payment must be made by the ATHLETE (or, where appropriate, by the Club if so agreed in writing) within a maximum period of 15 calendar days from the receipt of said bonus by the ATHLETE.

Extension of the Clause:
This participation right shall remain in force from the day of formalizing the hiring of our services, regardless of the number of transfers or clubs in which they provide their services, even after the termination of this representation contract by our agency.

Transparency: The ATHLETE agrees to provide the AGENCY with a copy of the signed contract or document proving the amount of the bonus within 48 hours of its signing.
contract.clause3Title: 3. Clause for Assignment and Exploitation of Image Rights
contract.clause3Desc:
Article [Y].‚Äì Management of Image Rights and Sponsorships

Management Exclusivity: The ATHLETE exclusively assigns to the AGENCY 10% of sponsorship contracts, advertising, and any other form of commercial exploitation of their image rights (name, voice, silhouette, signature, or any other distinctive sign) in any medium, including social networks and the technological platform owned by the AGENCY, from their entry into our platform, until the end of their professional career as an athlete.

Sponsorship Commission: For each commercial or sponsorship contract formalized during the term of this agreement, the AGENCY will receive a 10% commission on the total gross income derived from said contract.

Digital Rights: The ATHLETE specifically authorizes the use of their image for the creation of exclusive content on the website developed by the AGENCY, accepting that said content may be monetized through advertising or subscriptions, as agreed in specific annexes.

Prior Approval: The AGENCY agrees not to formalize any sponsorship contract that could harm the ATHLETE's reputation or that directly conflicts with the main sponsors of their current club, always requiring the final written approval of the ATHLETE.

Payment Settlement: Payments from brands will preferably be made to the AGENCY's account.
contract.clause4Desc: The contract has an initial duration of 5 years from the date of signing.
contract.clause5Desc: Early termination of the contract will carry a penalty as per the agreed terms.
contract.clause6Desc: The Agency reserves the "right of return" on negotiated contracts.
contract.clause7Desc: The Athlete commits to not contracting similar services with other agencies during the term of the contract.
contract.clause8Desc: This document must be digitally signed before or after payment for the contract to be effective.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.section1Desc: In compliance with Article 10 of Law 34/2002 on Information Society Services and Electronic Commerce:
legal.section2Desc: This website aims to provide information regarding sports marketing services, career projection, and image management for athletes.
legal.section3Desc: Accessing this website grants the status of "User" and implies the full acceptance of the conditions established herein.
legal.section4Desc: All website content is the property of Global Media Sports or its licensors. Reproduction without express authorization is strictly prohibited.
legal.section5Desc: The agency is not responsible for damages resulting from technical errors, service interruptions, or external attacks, having adopted reasonable security measures.
legal.section6Desc: The agency is not responsible for the content of linked external websites.
legal.section7Desc: The relationship with users is governed by Spanish legislation, and any controversy shall be submitted to the Courts and Tribunals of Barcelona.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Desc: Data provided by the user (name, email, phone number). Technical browsing data. Cookies and analytical tools.
privacy.section2Desc: To manage information requests. To manage athlete registration. To send commercial communications (with consent). To ensure platform security.
privacy.section3Desc: User consent. Execution of a contract. Legitimate interest.
privacy.section4Desc: Google Firebase. Email marketing services. Analytical tools. We do not sell personal data to third parties.
privacy.section5Desc: Data will be retained as long as the contractual relationship exists or there is a legal obligation to do so.
privacy.section6Desc: Users have the right to: Access, Rectification, Erasure (Right to be Forgotten), and Objection. Contact to exercise rights: [Privacy Email]
privacy.section7Desc: Technical measures such as SSL encryption and Firebase security rules are applied.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions of Service
terms.section1Desc: Global Media Sports offers sports career projection, digital content management, and social media positioning services.
terms.section2Desc: The user must provide truthful information to access the services.
terms.section3Desc: The service operates via a monthly fee. Payments are processed through a secure gateway.
terms.section4Desc: Specific conditions regarding duration and cancellation will be detailed in the individually signed Representation Contract.
terms.section5Desc: The Athlete: Commits to providing original and truthful audiovisual material. The Agency: Commits to professionally managing digital projection.
terms.section6Desc: Hiring the service implies the acceptance of these terms and the subsequent signing of the corresponding Representation Contract.

clauses.title: Clauses
clauses.section1Title: Sign-on and Transfer Bonus Participation Clause
clauses.section1Desc:
Consideration for Intermediation and Career Projection

Right to Commission:
By virtue of the marketing, brand projection, and career management services provided by the AGENCY, the ATHLETE recognizes and accepts that the AGENCY shall have the right to receive a percentage of any Sign-on Fee, hiring bonus, or similar amount that the ATHLETE receives as a consequence of signing a new employment contract or transfer with a club, team, or sports entity.

Applicable Percentage:
The financial consideration in favor of the AGENCY is set at 10% (plus the corresponding VAT) of the total gross amount of the aforementioned Sign-on Fee.

Accrual and Payment: Said commission shall accrue at the moment of signing the new contract. Payment must be made by the ATHLETE (or, where appropriate, by the Club if so agreed in writing) within a maximum period of 15 calendar days from the receipt of said bonus by the ATHLETE.

Clause Extension:
This participation right shall remain in effect from the day of formalization upon contracting our services, regardless of the number of transfers or clubs in which they provide their services, even after the termination of this representation contract by our agency.

Transparency: The ATHLETE agrees to provide the AGENCY with a copy of the signed contract or document proving the amount of the bonus within 48 hours after its signing.
clauses.section2Title: Image Rights Assignment and Exploitation Clause
clauses.section2Desc:
Article [Y].‚Äì Management of Image Rights and Sponsorships

Management Exclusivity: The ATHLETE assigns to the AGENCY, on an exclusive basis, 10% of sponsorship contracts, advertising, and any other form of commercial exploitation of their image rights (name, voice, silhouette, signature, or any other distinctive sign) on any medium, including social networks and the technological platform owned by the AGENCY, from their entry into our platform until the end of their professional career as an athlete.

Sponsorship Commission: For each commercial or sponsorship contract formalized during the term of this agreement, the AGENCY shall receive a commission of 10% of the total gross income derived from said contract.

Digital Rights: The ATHLETE specifically authorizes the use of their image for the creation of exclusive content on the website developed by the AGENCY, accepting that said content may be monetized through advertising or subscriptions, as agreed in specific annexes.

Prior Approval: The AGENCY agrees not to formalize any sponsorship contract that may harm the ATHLETE's reputation or that directly conflicts with the main sponsors of their current club, always requiring the final written approval of the ATHLETE.

Payment Settlement: Payments from brands will preferably be made to the AGENCY's account.
